column4: anyone have any clues for setting up a share of a ubuntu dir so it is visible from my windows clients?
Any suggestions of third party tricks?  I have all of my music and photos on my linux machine and would like my wife to be able to browse and copy
also you may need to set a samba password for the user ont he linunx box. whos home dir you wish windows tobe able to access
google for the 'using samba' online book. its got loads of details and examples for different tasks as well.
